titles.title: A bill to amend the definition of disaster, for purposes of section 7(b)(2) of the Small Business Act, to include below average water levels in the Great Lakes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

bill.summary: 2/17/2005--Introduced. Amends the Small Business Act to include under the definition of "disaster," for purposes of small business disaster loan relief, below-average water levels in the Great Lakes.
